I provide required details in form "Anaya","Female" and "Australia"
Click on shop button
Product list page is displayed "Products"

elements.name: Validating error message on not providing name field

steps.name: I launch General Strore app from device
I click on lets shop button without providing name field
I validate Toast error message "Please enter your name"
I launch General Strore app from device
I provide required details in form
Click on shop button
I search for a particular product and add the product to cart
I navigate to cart
